A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Everything negative has already been said. I've watched it just now for the first time since I saw it since it's release. It's a much much prettier movie than I remember\, and being prepared for the...choice....turns that the movie goes into makes it easier to ride with. However\, it's still garbage\, the flying superman bit is still jarring\, Poe is annoying\, Finn is idiotic and Rey is too OP. If star wars was a football team it'd be the Cleveland browns.
